00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"

00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00041 
00042 RefMeshTargetCalculator::~RefMeshTargetCalculator() {}
00043 
00044 bool RefMeshTargetCalculator::get_3D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00045                                              size_t element,
00046                                              Sample sample,
00047                                              MsqMatrix<3,3>& W_out,
00048                                              MsqError& err )
00049 {
00050   get_refmesh_Jacobian_3D( refMesh, pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00051   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00052 }
00053 
00054 bool RefMeshTargetCalculator::get_surface_target( PatchData& pd, 
00055                                                     size_t element,
00056                                                     Sample sample,
00057                                                     MsqMatrix<3,2>& W_out,
00058                                                     MsqError& err )
00059 {
00060   get_refmesh_Jacobian_2D( refMesh, pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00061   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00062 }
00063 
00064 bool RefMeshTargetCalculator::get_2D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00065                                              size_t element,
00066                                              Sample sample,
00067                                              MsqMatrix<2,2>& W_out,
00068                                              MsqError& err )
00069 {
00070   MsqMatrix<3,2> W_orient;
00071   bool valid = get_surface_target( pd, element, sample, W_orient, err );
00072   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid) return false;
00073   
00074   MsqMatrix<3,2> V;
00075   MsqMatrix<2,2> Q, delta;
00076   double lambda;
00077   valid = factor_surface( W_orient, lambda, V, Q, delta, err );
00078   W_out = lambda * Q * delta;
00079   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && valid;
00080 }
00081
